description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.XrBOn1MueVB4u5sV]{Nanocyte Knack}

Your nanites are luminous beacons that can flash brightly. The light shed by your nanite cloud increases in intensity, shedding bright light instead of dim light. You can use a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.vh6n0Ad3lamOJXpV]{nanite surge} as a swift action to overcharge your nanites, causing them to flare brightly. Each creature within your nanite cloud must succeed at a Fortitude save or be @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.tOpF6qjnlnKc10t7]{blinded} until the end of its next turn. A creature that succeeds at its Fortitude save is instead @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.YjE6UGzwOTfO9p4g]{dazzled} for a number of rounds equal to your Constitution bonus. After your nanites flare in this way, they go dark and canâ€™t shed illumination of any kind until you spend 1 Resolve Point to regain Stamina Points after a 10 minute rest. You must have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.VjS8fKIHpj4Mq2kn]{glimmering nanites} knack to select this knack.
